name: 2024 The 6th International Conference on Video, Signal and Image Processing
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-0964-7), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, submitted for indexing by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
organizers: University of Nottingham Ningbo China, China
